title: Aaron Sorkin Top 5s and ‘The Trial of the Chicago 7’
description:
Acclaimed writer-director Aaron Sorkin’s new film, ‘The Trial of the Chicago 7,’ hits Netflix this weekend, so Sean and Amanda commence a walk-and-talk on one of their favorite Hollywood voices. They examine his long career on film and television, share their top 5s, and break down his new movie from every angle.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
